title: Analysis and Application of E-Learning Facilitation Factors for Hotel Industry Employees

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: The goal is for hospitality industry professionals to systematically analyze motivations for e-learning adoption, then maximize learning outcomes through self-regulated learning strategies to enhance workplace efficiency.

learning_goals: Students can distinguish and explain "push" factors (work demands, managerial pressure) and "pull" factors (personal motivation, convenience) in E-learning
Students can independently perform goal setting, resource management, and performance evaluation in E-learning courses by utilizing self-regulated learning (SRL) strategies
Students can analyze at least three E-learning application cases applicable to hotel work environments and suggest improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
